name: Slime Game (LunalLane)
description:
Immerse in the world of Lunal Lane in a way never seen before...By taking care of your very own slime!

Nice, relaxing game play of farming and caring for your very own slime!



Use coins to unlock and discovers plenty of new seeds and slimes!

Grow trees,bushes,crops, and flowers. day or night!


Watch as your slime grows and adapts to the world you create it!

Will you spend your coins on new seeds? Or save up for a mysterious new slime?


The choice is yours in Slime Game(Working Title)

This is an early access title, game is subject to change frequently. Any bugs report to the discussion board or to @Pexvii on twitter.
